div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include codes from
http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 242990004 (Drug not available for administration)

Include codes from
http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 182895007 (Drug declined by patient)

title.value: SNOMED CT Reason Medication Not Given Codes

description.value: This value set includes all medication refused, medication not administered, and non-administration of necessary drug or medicine codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright 2002 International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
